title: What was the original name of the singing group The Byrds? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sardine Poopchute. But Columbia execs said “That name just won’t fly with us” and McGuinn said, “Yeah, OK. Fly. What about the Birds With A Y?” The execs said, “Just shorten it to The Byrds, spelled B-Y-R-D-S.” McGuinn said, “Oh, I see. OK.”
